briefTitle: Computed Tomography (CT) Based Lymphatic Mapping and Localization of Sentinel Lymph Node in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Computed Tomography (CT) Based Lymphatic Mapping and Localization of Sentinel Lymph Node in Breast Cancer Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer patients（T1-T2N0）
* Age 18-70
* Accept of SLNB
* Accept our protocol in the informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* LABC patients
* Age \< 18
* History of epilepsy
* History of thyrotoxicosis
* Pregnant women
